title: zcat steps (fastqc) fails on macOS
body:
fastqc steps crash the pipeline on macOS:

```
$ zcat test.fastq.gq 
zcat: can't stat: test.fastq.gq (test.fastq.gq.Z): No such file or directory
```

see more https://serverfault.com/questions/570024/zcat-gzcat-works-in-linux-not-on-osx-general-linux-osx-compatibility
